repo.name: incubator-heron
repo.description: Apache Heron (Incubating) is a realtime, distributed, fault-tolerant stream processing engine from Twitter

title: Fail on all javac warnings except 'unchecked'
body:
Once `NullStateManager.java` below is merged, the only javac warnings left should be unchecked warnings. This change turns on all warnings except for unchecked and fails the build if any of those are found.

Last thing to do is to fix the unchecked warnings and removed the exclude, which I'm moving onto now.

title: Refactor the order to set states on state manager.
body:
Heron determines whether a topology is running by checking the existence of topology def.
So we should first set topology def in submission, and last remove it in killing.
Also, move cleanState() from SchedulerUtils to RuntimeManagerRunner since:
1. It is more intuitive; it is not used in other places.
2. Better for testability.

title: Fix javac warnings in integration-tests
body:
Mostly adding `serializedVersionID` and fixing rawtypes.

Does anyone know why `BaseBatchBolt` or `IBatchBolt` take an unused generic type T? I'd love to remove the generics but I'm not sure what the comment in those classes means.

https://github.com/twitter/heron/blob/master/integration-test/src/java/com/twitter/heron/integration_test/core/BaseBatchBolt.java
https://github.com/twitter/heron/blob/master/integration-test/src/java/com/twitter/heron/integration_test/core/IBatchBolt.java

title: Shut down all executor services in SchedulerMain when killing a topology
body:
Shut down all executor services in SchedulerMain when killing a topology.
Otherwise, the SchedulerMain process may not exit due to live threads.
(Earlier we used System.exit() to forcibly exit the process, which is removed now.)

title: Troubleshooting guide for topology developers
body:
A rendered version can be found here:
https://github.com/saileshmittal/heron/blob/ui-docs/website/content/docs/developers/troubleshooting.md

Let me know if this is a good format, and if this is helpful. I will fix some TODOs and then leave this open for editing by others as well. This doc can grow as we see new issues more frequently.

title: Add cpp checkstyles to fix issue #420
body:
Similar to java checkstyles, to run add `--experimental_action_listener=tools/cpp:compile_cpp` to enable:

```
bazel build \
  --config=darwin \
  --experimental_action_listener=tools/cpp:compile_cpp \
  heron/stmgr/src/cpp:grouping-cxx
```

`@SuppressWarnings("checkstyle:methodlength")`

title: Review and changes on ReefScheduler
body:
Hi Ashvin,

Please treat this PR as a Review on your ReefScheduler. I did it in two ways:
1. Direct changes on the source code.
2. Added comments starting with: TODO(mfu) ...  . Associating a name with TODO indicates I have the concern; others can resolve and remove it.

This PR will not be checked in, and it is closed status. Please resolve my TODO comments.

Please let me know if any concerns. Thanks.

title: Print heron-ui listening address in the console
body:
Printing the listening url when the heron-ui starts up makes it easy for
people to either copy+paste the address or command + click (OSx) to
easily get to the heron ui.

Testing done:
1. Install new code
2. Start heron-ui with `heron-ui`
3. cmd+click the heron ui url in the output

repo.name: incubator-heron
repo.description: Apache Heron (Incubating) is a realtime, distributed, fault-tolerant stream processing engine from Twitter

title: Report BufferPoolMXBean metrics for topologies
body:
These metrics can be useful in diagnosing native memory usage for a
topology by measure that size and amount of direct and mapper byte
buffers created. This can be useful information when diagnosing memory
leaks outside of the heap that cause native memory to grow unbounded.

Fixes: https://github.com/twitter/heron/issues/407

Testing done:
1. Launched AckingTopology locally
2. Checked in metrics.json file for `__jvm-buffer-pool`

title: fix coding style for uploaders and statemgrs
body:
- Few are still remaining. This is due to catching a generic exception class - Exception. I think we should catch specific exceptions. I will leave it to the module owners

```
Starting audit...
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/uploaders/src/java/com/twitter/heron/uploader/s3/S3Uploader.java:117:7: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/uploaders/src/java/com/twitter/heron/uploader/s3/S3Uploader.java:129: Line has trailing spaces. [RegexpSingleline]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/uploaders/src/java/com/twitter/heron/uploader/s3/S3Uploader.java:166:9: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
Audit done.
Checkstyle ends with 3 errors.
```

```
Starting audit...
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/statemgrs/src/java/com/twitter/heron/statemgr/zookeeper/curator/CuratorStateManager.java:90:9: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/statemgrs/src/java/com/twitter/heron/statemgr/zookeeper/curator/CuratorStateManager.java:132:7: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/statemgrs/src/java/com/twitter/heron/statemgr/zookeeper/curator/CuratorStateManager.java:148:7: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/statemgrs/src/java/com/twitter/heron/statemgr/zookeeper/curator/CuratorStateManager.java:161:7: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
[ERROR] /private/var/tmp/_bazel_kramasamy/1f558875898fb6bdc4d350f3762f8e5d/heron16/heron/statemgrs/src/java/com/twitter/heron/statemgr/zookeeper/curator/CuratorStateManager.java:190:7: Catching 'Exception' is not allowed. [IllegalCatch]
```
